mapinfo.detailsText:
Jebel Musa, named after Musa bin Nusayr, overlooks the southern side of the Strait of Gibaltrar 
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -Outlaws: Dacoit / Thuggee 
 -Natives: Jesuits / Apache 
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Map by Durokan, Observer UI done by Aizamk
